languages.text: Планетарный штурм, стоивший нам великих потерь, завершился успехом. Но многие, слишком многие еретики успели отступить в Машинный храм и занять оборону в самом сердце вражеских позиций. Предстоящие бои обещали быть тяжелыми и кровопролитными. Однако же на поверхности мира теперь властвовали мы.

Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.
languages.original_text: Планетарный штурм, стоивший нам великих потерь, завершился успехом. Но многие, слишком многие еретики успели отступить в Машинный храм и занять оборону в самом сердце вражеских позиций. Предстоящие бои обещали быть тяжелыми и кровопролитными. Однако же на поверхности мира теперь властвовали мы.

traits.locale_text: Despite the great cost that we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

languages.text: 尽管我们付出了惨重的代价，但这场战役最终还是获得了胜利。不过，已经有太多敌人撤到了机械大教堂里，在敌方领土的核心地带做好了防御准备。可想而知，接下来的战斗一定会极其凶险、无比惨烈。但即便如此，这颗行星表面区域的控制权，也已经回到了我们手中。
languages.original_text: Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

traits.locale_text: 尽管我们付出了惨重的代价，但这场战役最终还是获得了胜利。不过，已经有太多敌人撤到了机械大教堂里，在敌方领土的核心地带做好了防御准备。可想而知，接下来的战斗一定会极其凶险、无比惨烈。但即便如此，这颗行星表面区域的控制权，也已经回到了我们手中。

languages.text: Malgré le prix terrible que nous avons dû payer, l'assaut planétaire s'est achevé sur notre victoire. Cependant, un trop grand nombre d'hérétiques avaient réussi à se retrancher dans la Cathédrale de la Machine, en plein cœur du territoire ennemi. Les batailles qui nous attendaient ne manqueraient pas d'être violentes et sanglantes, mais nous avions assis notre domination sur la surface de ce monde.
languages.original_text: Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

traits.locale_text: Malgré le prix terrible que nous avons dû payer, l'assaut planétaire s'est achevé sur notre victoire. Cependant, un trop grand nombre d'hérétiques avaient réussi à se retrancher dans la Cathédrale de la Machine, en plein cœur du territoire ennemi. Les batailles qui nous attendaient ne manqueraient pas d'être violentes et sanglantes, mais nous avions assis notre domination sur la surface de ce monde.

languages.text: 多大な犠牲を払ったにもかかわらず、惑星襲撃は成功に終わった。しかし、あまりに多くの異端者たちが機械大聖堂に引きこもり、敵陣の中心に陣取っていた。これから起こるであろう戦いは凶暴で陰惨なものになるだろう。とはいえ、我々は地表での覇権を確立したのだ。
languages.original_text: Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

traits.locale_text: 多大な犠牲を払ったにもかかわらず、惑星襲撃は成功に終わった。しかし、あまりに多くの異端者たちが機械大聖堂に引きこもり、敵陣の中心に陣取っていた。これから起こるであろう戦いは凶暴で陰惨なものになるだろう。とはいえ、我々は地表での覇権を確立したのだ。

languages.text: A pesar del alto precio que pagamos, el asalto planetario había sido un éxito. Sin embargo, demasiados herejes habían logrado retirarse a la Catedral Máquina, atrincherándose en el corazón del territorio enemigo. Las batallas que esperaban serían brutales y truculentas, pero una cosa estaba clara: Nos habíamos hecho con el control de la superficie.
languages.original_text: Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

traits.locale_text: A pesar del alto precio que pagamos, el asalto planetario había sido un éxito. Sin embargo, demasiados herejes habían logrado retirarse a la Catedral Máquina, atrincherándose en el corazón del territorio enemigo. Las batallas que esperaban serían brutales y truculentas, pero una cosa estaba clara: Nos habíamos hecho con el control de la superficie.

languages.text: Trotz des hohen Preises, den wir bezahlt hatten, endete der Angriff auf den Planeten im Erfolg. Viele, zu viele Ketzer hatten sich jedoch in die Maschinenkathedrale zurückgezogen und sich dort verschanzt, im Herzen des feindlichen Territoriums. Vor uns lagen brutale und grausame Kämpfe. Aber wir hatten unsere Überlegenheit auf der Oberfläche der Welt etabliert.
languages.original_text: Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.

traits.locale_text: Trotz des hohen Preises, den wir bezahlt hatten, endete der Angriff auf den Planeten im Erfolg. Viele, zu viele Ketzer hatten sich jedoch in die Maschinenkathedrale zurückgezogen und sich dort verschanzt, im Herzen des feindlichen Territoriums. Vor uns lagen brutale und grausame Kämpfe. Aber wir hatten unsere Überlegenheit auf der Oberfläche der Welt etabliert.

languages.text: Gezegen taarruzu, ödediğimiz ağır bedele rağmen başarıyla sonuçlandı. Ancak kâfirlerin çoğu; Makine Katedrali'ne geri çekilmeyi başarmış, düşman bölgesinin kalbinde siper almıştı. Yaklaşan savaşların zorlu ve kanlı olacağı aşikârdı. Ne olursa olsun gezegenin yüzeyinde üstünlüğü ele geçirdik.
languages.original_text: Despite the great cost we had paid, the planetary assault ended in success. However, many, too many heretics had withdrawn into the Machine Cathedral and entrenched themselves at the very heart of the enemy territory. The battles ahead were sure to be vicious and gruesome. Nevertheless, we had established our supremacy over the world's surface.
